name: BBa_K2306003
title: Secretory-abundant heat soluble protein 33020 (SAHS 33020)
description: This Biobrick features the gene sequence that encodes for the production of the tardigrade intrisically disordered protein (TDP) "SAHS 68234". This is one of the several heat soluble proteins found in the tardigrades capable of protecting other fragile biological parts upon desiccation by generating a crystal matrix. Therefore, this tardigrade protein can be combined with other perishable biological material (e.g. proteins) to increase its stability after dehydration.
source: The sequence of this part was derived from the supplementary material of the paper "Tardigrades Use Intrinsically Disordered Proteins to Survive Desiccation" by Boothby et al. (2017)
